remarks: If a property is true for an ordinal number, then the minimum ordinal number for which it is true is smaller or equal.  Theorem Schema 61 of [Suppes] p. 228.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2003.)
statement:
onintss.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
onintss $p |- ( A e. On -> ( ps -> |^| { x e. On | ph } C_ A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
